content.p: All Nottingham alumni can continue to benefit from careers advice and support long after graduation. With access to one-to-one careers guidance and global alumni networking, we're here to help - wherever you're heading next. Want to find graduate vacancies, attend a recruitment event, try out a free psychometric test or browse career resources? Try our Careers and Employability Service. We've spoken to some of our successful alumni and friends of the University to bring you first hand careers hints and tips. Now is the time to think about finding the career that's right for you but with so many opportunities out there, we know it can be hard to plan for the future. That's why we're here to help. We have new graduate events coming up this autumn and give practical alumni tips and advice in our monthly enewsletters - so don't worry, there are lots of support on offer to help you get ahead. Postgraduate study at Nottingham is highly rewarding. Expand your knowledge or learn something new. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8373 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8657 email: alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my
